verses.roman:
tinera smaraṇe haya vighna-vināśana
anāyāse haya nija vāñchita-pūraṇa

synonyms: tinera—of these three; smaraṇe—by remembrance; haya—there is; vighna-vināśana—the destruction of all difficulties; anāyāse—very easily; haya—there is; nija—our own; vāñchita—of the desired object; pūraṇa—fulfillment.
translation: Such remembrance destroys all difficulties and very easily enables one to fulfill his own desires.
